name: Scrappy Defence
description:
Intense RTS - Tower Defence hybrid set in a dystopian future where the scraps of the past are essential to survival

A game created by BrexBytes for Jamfuser, a games jam created for the Tranzfuser funding opportunity (funded by the UK Games Fund).

Team Members:
Jared Merritt
Bradley Anderson
Louis Weston O'neill
Luke Burton
Nick Linehan
Reece Jackson
